name: Kajmak With Herbs
description: Kajmak is a thick, tangy clotted cream from the Balkans usually made with sheep’s or cow’s milk. It's often served with Balkan burgers, pljeskavica.
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, dips and spreads

recipeInstructions.text: Bring cream cheese, butter, ricotta and sour cream to cool room temperature. In a mixer or a food processor, combine cream cheese and butter and mix until fluffy and smooth. Mix in ricotta and sour cream.
Add remaining ingredients and mix or process until thoroughly incorporated. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve, up to 3 days. Serve with Balkan burgers (pljeskavica, see recipe) or as a dip.
